onboarding.title: Welcome to Mach10
onboarding.form_3_label: What is your main goal with this website?
onboarding.form_3_help: Remember, learning is often challenging, but some of the most worthwhile things in life are. Consistency can take you to anywhere you want.
onboarding.form_4_label: How would you rate your computer skills?
form_4_list: I know how to use a computer but never did technical work
onboarding.form_5_label: What kind of devices do you own?
onboarding.form_7: Perfect! We‚Äôre here to help you every step of your journey. Let‚Äôs get started!
onboarding.why_text_1: We would like to ask you a few question in order to know our audience better and create the most relevant experience for you. Knowing who is using our content makes us better at crafting the best possible content.
onboarding.why_text_2: These answers are optional and you are completely free not to answer anything, we get it

profile.intro: We‚Äôd love to learn more about you. Could you share with us what is your main goal applying here? Even if it‚Äôs just curiosity, we‚Äôre interested to hear ‚ò∫.
